CustomField.formula: IF (AND (OR( Cleansing_Program__c = False, NOT(INCLUDES(Additional_Guarantees__c,"Companies Cleansed"))), to_Appt_Goal_Actual__c >= 1), Monthly_Data_Collection_Goal__c *(50/100),Monthly_Data_Collection_Goal__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Monthly Company Cleansed Goal is prorated 50% when there isn't a company cleansed guarantee, % to Appt Goal Actual is at least 100%.
CustomField.label: Company Cleansed Goal Formula
